page.title: 16REDHILL'S NEW CENTRE
page.content:
Some pupils from Springvale Middle School went to the Town Hall to talk to Mr. Betts, the Planning Officer responsible for the {Warwick Quadrant. { } The Quadrant will be for public use & will include the following:- a sports hall, a library with resource centre, offices & a public hall. There will also be small shops, a supermarket & an office block, creating 1 500 jobs in all. The project, costing{Â£30 000 000,}will be paid for by Norwich Union Insurance & the County & Borough Councils.
There will be room for 400 cars in the multi-storey car park. Sainsbury's will have the supermarket but other shops have not yet been allocated.
